item.title: Problem 4: Largest palindrome product
item.description: Problem A palindromic number reads the same both ways. The largest palindrome made from the product of two 2-digit numbers is 9009 = 91 × 99. Find the largest palindrome made from the product of two 3-digit numbers. Explanation The overall approach for this problem is very simple: we’ll loop through all combinations of two three-digit numbers, multiply them, and see if the product is a palindrome or not.
